type.name: Types
type.summary: Defines types that may be used in several contexts, e.g. when declaring Script properties and when specifying the type of a Global Variable.

type.name: WeatherSoundTypes
type.summary: Defines the types of weather sounds.

type.name: Color
type.summary: Represents a color definition.

type.name: TimeColor
type.summary: Represents a color at a certain point in time.

type.name: TimeFloat
type.summary: Represents a floating point value at a certain point in time.

type.name: WeatherAlphaSet
type.summary: Represents a set of alpha channel for each of the eight parts of the day: early dawn, dawn, late dawn, day, early dusk, late dusk and night.

type.name: WeatherCloudLayer
type.summary: Represents one of the 32 layers of clouds.

type.name: WeatherColorSet
type.summary: Represents a set of weather colors for each of the eight parts of the day: early dawn, dawn, late dawn, day, early dusk, late dusk and night.

type.name: WeatherFresnelSet
type.summary: Represents a set of weather fresnel power for each of the eight parts of the day: early dawn, dawn, late dawn, day, early dusk, late dusk and night.

type.name: WeatherSound
type.summary: Represents a weather sound of certain type.

type.name: WeatherSoundCollection
type.summary: Represents a collection of WeatherSounds.

type.name: Form
type.summary: Represents a form the type of which is either unknown, unsupported or unresolved. To convert an unknown form to a specific form use the appropriate extension method. Properties and methods provided by this class are available to all forms.

type.name: FormCollection
type.summary: Represents a collection of forms. A collection may contain mixed form types or only forms of a specific type. To filter and convert a mixed collection to a specific form collection use the appropriate extension method.

type.name: Aoru
type.summary: Represents an Activation Rule form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Flst
type.summary: Represents a Form List form.

type.name: Gdry
type.summary: Represents a God Rays form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Glob
type.summary: Represents a Global Variable form.

type.name: Gmst
type.summary: Represents a Game Setting form.

type.name: Imad
type.summary: Represents an Image Space Adapter form.

type.name: Imgs
type.summary: Represents an Image Space form.

type.name: Kywd
type.summary: Represents a Keyword form.

type.name: Rfct
type.summary: Represents a Visual Effect form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Sndr
type.summary: Represents a Sound Reference form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Spgd
type.summary: Represents a Shader Particle Geometry form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Stat
type.summary: Represents a Static form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Wthr
type.summary: Represents a Weather form.

type.name: Debug
type.summary: Provides methods that may assist during development and troubleshooting.

type.name: Forms
type.summary: Provides methods that can be used to look up and retrieve any available forms.

type.name: Math
type.summary: Provides useful mathematical functions.
